prompts: Create a legendary bird Pokemon with vibrant colors and a majestic wingspan.
I want a mythical creature resembling a phoenix, with fiery plumage and a graceful flight.
Generate a majestic fire-type Pokemon that embodies the spirit of the sun.
Make a colorful winged Pokemon that radiates warmth and positivity.
Imagine a bird Pokemon that inspires hope and has a rainbow-like appearance.
Design a Pokemon with a fiery tail and shimmering wings that glows in sunlight.
Show me a Pokemon that combines elements of fire and air with brilliant colors.
